review: Our whole family loves the Fire TV Stick. We have previously used the Wii, the Xbox and our smart sound bar. We bought the Fire TV Stick for our bedroom. It is fast and easy to set up and works so fast. With the other devices we use for streaming movies through Netflix and hulu buffer for what seems like forever. The Fire TV Stick goes right to whatever you what, right away. I think we're going to get one for the living room now. The app to use your phone or tablet works great too. Love it and for $40 it's worth trying. You won't be sorry.
author: Connie M

review: I was really excited for HBO GO and the ability to stream Games of Thrones finally, only to be disappointed to realize I should have done my homework.  My Cable provider doesn't support this device.  I won't return it as I find the interface with my Amazon Prime Awesome and some of the other apps that are available to the Fire TV Stick that I don't have on my Vizio Smart TV.
